document_data.name: Zespara Alather
document_data.mainbody: '''Zespara Alather''' was a talented swordsmith who ran the [[House of the Bright Blade]] in [[Mirabar]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Occasionally one to partake in adventuring, Zespara had powerful friends, notably, several anonymous [[mage]]s. Also a member of the [[Harpers]], she also sometimes operated as an agent of the [[Lords' Alliance]]. As such, Zespara Alather had slain many dangerous members of evil organizations such as the [[Zhentarim]], the [[Red Wizards]], and the [[Arcane Brotherhood]].
document_data.Relationships: She was served by six apprentices, the oldest of whom was [[Calauthra Morgyr]].
